channel.title: Why isn't my NPC changing the drop or moving?!?!?
channel.description:
Okay, I have my npcsdrops.cfg file fine, but it still drops ourg bones? Why is it doing this? I'm compiling and restarting server as well.
Edit: Also my NPC's don't move even when I change the walk type and add X-Y ranges.

item.title: Why isn't my NPC changing the drop or moving?!?!?
item.dc:creator: @yodudes yodudes
item.description:
@yodudes wrote:

[quote=“Spud pickles, post:2, topic:422994”]if your using pi, all u gotta do is got to droptmc, or something, and yeah then for your npcs to move

in ur spawn config, its like i
id coords highth move
spawn = 5666 3483 3093 0 1 40 500 350 Barrelchest
change that 1 to a 0 if u want them to stand still, make it one if u want them tomove, hope i could help[/quote]
What’s PI. I’m on 317, I haven’t coded since 2009, and I just found this source on my laptop.

Read full topic
